name: Cat Vs Panda
description:
This game is about a Cat and a Panda going throughout different minigames and seeing who can win the different challenges and games Game Modes -
  • Dodgeball
  • Race
  • Parkour
Player 1 Controls (Cat) -

Up = W 

Left = A

Right = D

Player 2 Controls (Panda) -

Up = Up Arrow Key

Left = Left Arrow Key

Right = Right Arrow Key
